title: Let's get a bit spooky. It's Halloween time
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
How does a fun-loving American and her family celebrate Halloween in Slovakia? With a strobe light dance party, indoor trick-or-treating and some pumpkin carving of course! Experience a multicultural Halloween by proxy on this week’s episode of Spectacular Slovakia. 
 
Photo: TASR 
Presenter: Anna Fay
itunes:subtitle: How does a fun-loving American and her family cel…
